posts.post_content:
I’ve been working hard on the t206 Hall of Famers recently. I’d like to start filling the remaining holes. I’m picky as all hell and there are some that I much rather have than others. Looking in the good to very good range, raw or graded. For the higher end guys, poor to good+ typically works for me. 

I have denoted which ones I want with off backs, and corresponding priority levels. Off backs are great but I can live without them. Thank you for looking and feel free to PM or email me at [url]wazywhoa@gmail.com[/url]. Also please see the ones I’m looking to upgrade, and will always consider OM southern leaguers. Thank you!

Bender - trees (off back only, low priority)
Brown port - (off back only, high priority)
Brown - Cubs on shirt (off back preferred, medium priority)
Chance - batting (off back preferred, low priority)
Cobb - green (high priority)
Cobb - bat off (highest priority)
Jimmy Collins (off back only, low priority)
Crawford - throwing (off back preferred, medium priority)
Duffy (off back only, low priority)
Griffith - batting (off back only, low) 
Jennings - port (off back only, high priority)
Keeler - batting (off back preferred, medium)
Lajoie - throwing (I have an A to upgrade)
Marquard - hands at sides (off back only, low priority)
Marquard - throwing (off back only, low priority)
Matty - portrait (want to upgrade my 1.5)
Iron man (off back only, low priority)
McGraw - cap (off back only, low priority)
Mcgraw - glove (off back only, low priority)
Tinker - bat off 
Willis - all (would prefer off backs)
Young - port (high priority)
Young - no glove (medium priority) 

Would like to Upgrade: 
Speaker - (SGC 2)
Chesbro - (SGC 2)

Open to:
Cad Cole
Ed Foster
Charlie Fritz
George Manion*
Pat McCauley*
George Paige*
Ray Ryan
Shag Shaughnessy*(biggest priority) 
Juan Violat (Violat)

Always looking for off backs of commons as well. Thanks!

Help me fill some holes?

You're gross Waz!
